/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a striking view of a highway overpass in Beijing, China. The overpass, a marvel of modern engineering, is constructed from concrete and steel, with multiple lanes of traffic flowing smoothly above it. The perspective of the image is from the ground, looking up at the overpass, giving a sense of its impressive scale and design. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, you can see trees and power lines, adding a touch of nature and urban life to the image.
